name: test-coverage
description: Run tests for both services and verify code coverage meets 80% threshold

prompts.name: main
prompts.description: Run tests and check coverage for both microservices
prompts.content:
Execute the following tasks:

1. Run tests for the Mutant Service (dna-demo):
   - Change to dna-demo directory
   - Run: ./mvnw test
   - Check if tests pass
   - Extract code coverage percentage from JaCoCo report

2. Run tests for the Stats Service (stats-service):
   - Change to stats-service directory
   - Run: ./mvnw test
   - Check if tests pass
   - Extract code coverage percentage from JaCoCo report

3. Verify coverage meets requirements:
   - Both services must have ≥80% code coverage
   - Report results in a clear summary table
   - Flag any services below threshold

4. Summary format:
   ```
   Service          | Tests | Status | Coverage | Meets 80%?
   ----------------|-------|--------|----------|------------
   Mutant Service  | X/Y   | ✓/✗    | XX.X%    | ✓/✗
   Stats Service   | X/Y   | ✓/✗    | XX.X%    | ✓/✗
   ```

If any service fails tests or is below 80% coverage, provide specific details about what failed.
